item.title: CVE-2022-37397|2024-08-03T10:29:21.063Z -- yugabyte%2C%20inc. -- yugabyte%20db
item.description: An issue was discovered in the YugabyteDB 2.6.1 when using LDAP-based authentication in YCQL with Microsoftâ€™s Active Directory. When anonymous or unauthenticated LDAP binding is enabled, it allows bypass of authentication with an empty password.
